name: Farmer's Life (itch) (Karmitas)
description:
This game was made in 4 days in a competition against a friend, the competition was to use AIs to create a video game, we didn't choose anything, we just programmed the game. It's just for fun, I know the game is not good.

Inpired by:  https://youtu.be/FK2yaj3Kovg

AIs in use:

https://melobytes.com/en/

https://beta.openai.com/playground/p/default-tweet-classifier

https://experiments.withgoogle.com/ai/sound-maker/view/

https://labs.openai.com/e/Wac6cdWD1TRKf5RVziYXMEfA/AGYrGLB1xH13wg6RUHjUW1m8
